participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and determined, always looking for new challenges.
participant_1.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.
